Title: T1: Repo kickoff & security.md
Body: Create repo, add README, security.md, branch protection, issue templates. Deliver: threat-model.md

Title: T2: Account hardening & CloudTrail
Body: Enable CloudTrail -> S3 + CloudWatch, create S3 bucket with BlockPublicAccess, ensure root MFA, remove root keys, create IncidentOps user

Title: T3: Secrets inventory & SSM migration
Body: Inventory secrets, create secrets-inventory.csv, migrate secrets to SSM SecureString, PR to remove plaintext

Title: T4: Exposure-detection Lambda + GitHub webhook
Body: Create Lambda + API Gateway, webhook from GitHub, scan commit diffs for key regex, publish alerts to SNS/Slack

Title: T5: Rotation automation
Body: Lambda/tool that creates replacement keys, stores to SSM, updates deployment config, deactivates old key after verification

Title: T6: App integration (Laravel) to use SSM
Body: Refactor app to remove static creds, add Laravel helper to fetch from SSM, use IAM role for runtime

Title: T7: Monitoring & runbook
Body: CloudWatch metric filters, SNS Slack alerts, runbook.md + tabletop drill

Title: T4-test: Synthetic detection test
Body: Create test commit payload containing AKIA... and validate Lambda disables test key and sends alert

Title: T3-cleanup: Remove secrets from git history
Body: Use git-filter-repo (or BFG) to remove historic credentials, document process
